bloom.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a mass of bloom on the apple trees
bloom.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the healthy happy appearance that someone has, especially when they are young
bloom.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The rosy bloom of her cheeks had faded.
bloom.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: if a plant or a flower blooms, its flowers appear or open
bloom.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to become happier, healthier, or more successful in a way that is very noticeable
bloom.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: She was blooming the last time I saw her.
